Class MenuSelect

java.lang.Object
metroMalaga.Controller.menu.MenuSelect
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, ChangeListener
public class MenuSelect extends Object implements ChangeListener
Controller class for handling the main menu tabbing and panel switching. Manages the initialization and cleanup of Crud, FTP, and SMTP panels.
